original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Buddhavagga
analyzed: buddha vagga

original: 4. Paṭipadādosapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, yadā bodhisatto dukkarakārikaṁ akāsi, netādiso aññatra ārambho
analyzed: bhante nāgasena yadā bodhisatto dukkara kārikam akāsi na itādisaḥ aññatra ārambhaḥ

original: ahosi nikkamo kilesayuddhaṁ maccusenaṁ vidhamanaṁ āhārapariggaho dukkarakārikā, evarūpe
analyzed: ahosi nikkamaḥ kilesa yuddham maccusenam vidhamanam āhāra pariggahaḥ dukkara kārikā evarūpe

original: parakkame kiñci assādaṁ alabhitvā tameva cittaṁ parihāpetvā evamavoca ‘na kho panāhaṁ
analyzed: parakkame kiñci assādam a labhitvā tam eva cittam parihāpetvā evam avoca na kho pana āha

original: imāya kaṭukāya dukkarakārikāya adhigacchāmi uttari manussadhammaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ,
analyzed: imāya kaṭukāya dukkara kārikāya adhigacchāmi uttari manussa dhammam alam ariya ñāṇa dassana visesa

original: siyā nu kho añño maggo bodhāyā’ti, tato nibbinditvā aññena maggena sabbaññutaṁ patto,
analyzed: siyā nu kho aññaḥ maggaḥ bodhāya ati tatas nibbinditvā aññena maggena sabbaññu tam patto

original: puna tāya paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati samādapeti.
analyzed: puna tāya paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati samādapa iti

original: ‘Ārambhatha nikkhamatha,
analyzed: ārambhatha nikkhamatha

original: yuñjatha buddhasāsane;
analyzed: yuñjatha buddha sāsane

original: Dhunātha maccuno senaṁ,
analyzed: dhunātha maccunā sena

original: naḷāgāraṁva kuñjaro’ti.
analyzed: kuñjara uti

original: Kena nu kho, bhante nāgasena, kāraṇena tathāgato yāya paṭipadāya attanā nibbinno virattarūpo, tattha sāvake anusāsati samādapetī”ti?
analyzed: kena nu kho bhante nāgasena kāraṇena tathāgataḥ yāya paṭipadāya attanā nibbinnaḥ viratta rūpo tattha sāvake anusāsati samādapeti iti

original: “Tadāpi, mahārāja, etarahipi sāyeva paṭipadā, taṁyeva paṭipadaṁ paṭipajjitvā bodhisatto sabbaññutaṁ patto.
analyzed: tadā api mahā rāja etarahi pi sāyā iva paṭipadā tayā iva paṭipadam paṭipajjitvā bodhisatto sabbaññu tam pattaḥ

original: Api ca, mahārāja, bodhisatto ativīriyaṁ karonto niravasesato āhāraṁ uparundhi.
analyzed: api ca mahā rāja bodhisatto ati vīriyam karontaḥ niravasesataḥ āhāram uparundhi

original: Tassa āhārūparodhena cittadubbalyaṁ uppajji.
analyzed: tassa āhāra uparodhena citta dubbalyam uppajji

original: So tena dubbalyena nāsakkhi sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇituṁ, so mattamattaṁ kabaḷīkārāhāraṁ sevanto tāyeva paṭipadāya nacirasseva sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇi.
analyzed: saḥ tena dubbalyena na asakkhi sabbaññu tam pāpuṇitu saḥ matta mattam kabaḷīkāra āhāram sevantaḥ tāya iva paṭipadāya nacirassa iva sabbaññu tam pāpuṇi

original: Sāyeva, mahārāja, paṭipadā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ sabbaññutañāṇappaṭilābhāya.
analyzed: sāyā iva mahā rāja paṭipadā sabbesam tathāgatānam sabbaññuta ñāṇa paṭilābhāya

original: Yathā, mahārāja, sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ āhāro upatthambho, āhārūpanissitā sabbe sattā sukhaṁ anubhavanti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja sabbesam sattānam āhāraḥ upatthambhaḥ āhāra upanissitā sabbe sattā sukham anubhavanti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, sāyeva paṭipadā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ sabbaññutañāṇappaṭilābhāya,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja sāyā iva paṭipadā sabbesam tathāgatānam sabbaññuta ñāṇa ppaṭilābhāya

original: neso, mahārāja, doso ārambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa, yena tathāgato
analyzed: na isaḥ mahā rāja dosaḥ ārambhassa na nikkamassa na kilesa yuddhassa yena tathāgataḥ

original: tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, atha kho āhārūparodhasseveso doso, sadā
analyzed: tasmin samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññuta ñāṇa atha kho āhāra uparodhassa iva īsaḥ doso sadā

original: paṭiyattā yevesā paṭipadā.
analyzed: paṭiyattā yā iva isā paṭipadā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso addhānaṁ ativegena gaccheyya, tena so pakkhahato vā bhaveyya pīṭhasappī vā asañcaro pathavitale.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ addhānam ativegena gaccheyya tena saḥ pakkha hataḥ vā bhaveyya pīṭhasappī vā a sañcaraḥ pathavi tale

original: Api nu kho, mahārāja, mahāpathaviyā doso atthi, yena so puriso pakkhahato ahosī”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho mahā rāja mahā pathaviyā doso atthi yena so puriso pakkha hato ahosi iti

original: “Na hi, bhante;
analyzed: na hi bhante

original: sadā paṭiyattā, bhante, mahāpathavī, kuto tassā doso?
analyzed: sadā paṭiyattā bhante mahā pathavī kutas tassā doso

original: Vāyāmasseveso doso, yena so puriso pakkhahato ahosī”ti.
analyzed: vāyāmassa iva eso doso yena so puriso pakkha hataḥ ahosi iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, neso doso ārambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja na isaḥ dosaḥ ārambhassa na nikkamassa na kilesa yuddhassa

original: yena tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, atha kho āhārūparodhasseveso
analyzed: yena tathāgato tasmin samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññuta ñāṇa atha kho āhāra uparodhassa iva īso

original: doso sadā paṭiyattā yevesā paṭipadā.
analyzed: doso sadā paṭiyattā yā iva isā paṭipadā

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, puriso kiliṭṭhaṁ sāṭakaṁ nivāseyya, na so taṁ dhovāpeyya, neso doso udakassa, sadā paṭiyattaṁ udakaṁ.
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja purisaḥ kiliṭṭham sāṭakam nivāseyya na saḥ tam dhovāpeyya na isaḥ dosaḥ udakassa sadā paṭiyattam udaka

original: Purisasseveso doso.
analyzed: purisassa iva esaḥ doso

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, neso doso ārambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa, yena
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja na isaḥ dosaḥ ārambhassa na nikkamassa na kilesa yuddhassa yena

original: tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, atha kho āhārūparodhasseveso doso,
analyzed: tathāgato tasmin samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññuta ñāṇa atha kho āhāra uparodhassa iva iso doso

original: sadā paṭiyattā yevesā paṭipadā, tasmā tathāgato tāyeva paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati
analyzed: sadā paṭiyattā yeva isā paṭipadā tasmai tathāgato tāya iva paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati

original: samādapeti, evaṁ kho, mahārāja, sadā paṭiyattā anavajjā sā paṭipadā”ti.
analyzed: samādapa iti evam kho mahā rāja sadā paṭiyattā anavajjā sā paṭipadā ati

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Paṭipadādosapañho catuttho.
analyzed: paṭipadā dosa pañho catuttho
